name: Spin to Win (Shane Gadsby, Saryah12)
description:
"Oh, no. No, no, no."

"Come on up and at 'em!"

"But I HATE bugs, they get everywhere!"

"Too bad, it's part of your training."

"Eep. Welp, I here I go."

Just before stepping into the arena, he closes his eyes and mouth, and starts swinging wildly...

Made for 2021 Kenney Jam - Theme: Rotation.

Sounds effects credit to Dan "Pepper" Loeb.

Music by Saryah12.
